Package cz.zcu.fav.kiv.jsim.random

This package provides several random number generators in a form of streams.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
JSimDrawStream A stream generating random boolean values.
JSimExponentialStream A stream generating random real values with an exponential distribution with a given lambda.
JSimGaussianStream A stream generating random real values with a Gaussian (aka normal) distribution with given mu and sigma.
JSimUniformStream A stream generating random real values with a uniform distribution on a given interval.
JSimUserObjectStream A stream generating user-defined objects according to their corresponding user-defined absolute rates.
 

Package cz.zcu.fav.kiv.jsim.random Description

This package provides several random number generators in a form of streams. Once a stream is created, its parameters cannot be changed, only reported. The sequence of random numbers can be obtained from a stream by repetitive calling to its getNext() method.

Since:
J-Sim version 0.3.0
